widget.name: Bitmap
widget.paint: if oCtrl:oBitmap != Nil DrawBitmap( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight ) else DrawEdge( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,5 ) endif

widget.name: Icon
widget.paint: if oCtrl:oBitmap != Nil DrawIcon( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,0,0 ) else DrawEdge( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,5 ) endif

widget.name: DatePicker control
widget.paint: DrawEdge( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,10 ) FillRect( hDC,2,2,oCtrl:nWidth-2,oCtrl:nHeight-2,21 ) SetBkColor( hDC,16777215 ) DrawText( hDC,Dtoc(Date()),2,3,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight ) DrawBitmap( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,,oCtrl:nWidth-oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth-2,2 )

widget.name: Line
widget.paint: if oCtrl:GetProp( "lVertical" ) == "True" DrawEdge( hDC,1,0,1,oCtrl:nHeight,6 ) else DrawEdge( hDC,0,1,oCtrl:nWidth,1,6 ) endif

widget.name: Owner drawn button
widget.paint: private xt := Max(Val(oCtrl:GetProp("TextLeft")),2),yt DrawButton( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,5 ) if ( yt := Val(oCtrl:GetProp("TextTop")) ) == 0 DrawText( hDC,oCtrl:title,xt,0,oCtrl:nWidth-xt*2,oCtrl:nHeight,37 ) else DrawText( hDC,oCtrl:title,xt,yt,oCtrl:nWidth-xt*2,yt+GetTextMetric(hDC)[1],37 ) endif if oCtrl:oBitmap != Nil xt := Iif( (xt:=Val(oCtrl:GetProp("BmpLeft")))==0,(oCtrl:nWidth-oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth)/2,xt ) yt := Iif( (yt:=Val(oCtrl:GetProp("BmpTop")))==0,(oCtrl:nHeight-oCtrl:oBitmap:nHeight)/2,yt ) DrawBitmap( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,,xt,yt,oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth,oCtrl:oBitmap:nHeight ) endif

widget.name: Shade button
widget.paint: private xt := Max(Val(oCtrl:GetProp("TextLeft")),2),yt DrawButton( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,5 ) if ( yt := Val(oCtrl:GetProp("TextTop")) ) == 0 DrawText( hDC,oCtrl:title,xt,0,oCtrl:nWidth-xt*2,oCtrl:nHeight,37 ) else DrawText( hDC,oCtrl:title,xt,yt,oCtrl:nWidth-xt*2,yt+GetTextMetric(hDC)[1],37 ) endif if oCtrl:oBitmap != Nil xt := Iif( (xt:=Val(oCtrl:GetProp("BmpLeft")))==0,(oCtrl:nWidth-oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth)/2,xt ) yt := Iif( (yt:=Val(oCtrl:GetProp("BmpTop")))==0,(oCtrl:nHeight-oCtrl:oBitmap:nHeight)/2,yt ) DrawBitmap( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,,xt,yt,oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth,oCtrl:oBitmap:nHeight ) endif

widget.name: Push button Ex
widget.paint: private xt := 2,yt,cpp //Max(Val(oCtrl:GetProp("TextLeft")),2),yt DrawButton( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,5 ) if oCtrl:oBitmap != Nil cpp := oCtrl:GetProp("PicturePosition") // array="Left,Center,Right" > yt := (oCtrl:nHeight-oCtrl:oBitmap:nHeight)/2 xt := Iif(cpp="0-Left",1,iif(cpp="2-Right",oCtrl:nWidth-oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth,(oCtrl:nWidth-oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth)/2 )) if cpp="0" // left DrawText( hDC,oCtrl:title,xt+oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth,0,oCtrl:nWidth-xt*2,oCtrl:nHeight,37 ) DrawBitmap( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,,xt,yt,oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth,oCtrl:oBitmap:nHeight ) elseif cpp="2" //Right" DrawText( hDC,oCtrl:title,1,0,oCtrl:nWidth-oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,37 ) DrawBitmap( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,,xt-3,yt,oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth,oCtrl:oBitmap:nHeight ) else // center DrawText( hDC,oCtrl:title,0,yt/2+19,oCtrl:nWidth,yt+oCtrl:nHeight,37 ) DrawBitmap( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,,xt,yt-8,oCtrl:oBitmap:nWidth,oCtrl:oBitmap:nHeight ) endif else DrawText( hDC,oCtrl:title,xt,0,oCtrl:nWidth-xt*2,oCtrl:nHeight,37 ) endif

widget.name: Browse
widget.paint: DrawEdge( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,10 ) FillRect( hDC,2,2,oCtrl:nWidth-2,oCtrl:nHeight-2,21 ) DrawButton( hDC,2,2,20,20,5 ) DrawButton( hDC,21,2,70,20,5 ) DrawButton( hDC,2,21,20,50,5 )

widget.name: Column
Grid
widget.paint: DrawEdge( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,10 ) FillRect( hDC,2,2,oCtrl:nWidth-2,oCtrl:nHeight-2,21 ) DrawButton( hDC,2,2,20,20,5 ) //DrawButton( hDC,21,2,70,20,5 ) DrawButton( hDC,2,21,20,50,5 )

widget.name: Timer
widget.paint: oCtrl:oBitmap := HBitmap():AddFile("resource\bmp\smTimer.bmp") if oCtrl:oBitmap != Nil DrawEdge( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth+7,oCtrl:nHeight+7,5 ) DrawBitmap( hDC,oCtrl:oBitmap:handle,,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight ) else DrawEdge( hDC,0,0,oCtrl:nWidth,oCtrl:nHeight,5 ) endif

property.name: FileDbf
property.code2: Private cAlias cAlias := LEFT(CutPath( value ),AT(".",CutPath( value ))-1) IF !EMPTY(value) .AND. SELECT(cAlias) = 0 IF select(calias) = 0 USE (value) NEW SHARED ALIAS (cAlias) //ftmp ENDIF ENDIF

property.name: lVertical
property.code2: private nTemp if (value=="True") .and. oCtrl:nHeight < oCtrl:nWidth nTemp := oCtrl:nHeight oCtrl:nHeight := oCtrl:nWidth oCtrl:nWidth := nTemp elseif !(value=="True") .and. oCtrl:nWidth < oCtrl:nHeight nTemp := oCtrl:nWidth oCtrl:nWidth := oCtrl:nHeight oCtrl:nHeight := nTemp endif oCtrl:SetProp( "Height",Ltrim(Str(oCtrl:nHeight)) ) oCtrl:SetProp( "Width",Ltrim(Str(oCtrl:nWidth)) )

property.name: Bitmap
Icon
property.code3: if oCtrl:ClassName()=="HDIALOG" oCtrl:oIcon:= Iif( At(".",value)!=0,HIcon():AddFile(value),HIcon():Resource(value)) else if !empty(value) oCtrl:oBitmap := Iif( At(".",value)!=0,HIcon():AddFile(value),HIcon():Resource(value)) endif endif
